appName: Climb Out: Escape From Anomalous Sewer
displayName: Climb Out: Escape From Anomalous Sewer
display_name: Climb Out: Escape From Anomalous Sewer
display_long_description:
You are a professional detective. For some unknown reason, you wake up to find yourself trapped in a mysterious, seemingly endless underground sewer loop. Stay calm in the darkness... at least you have a headlamp to use, and a digital camera on you, though its battery is dying.

Move forward with your hands, then climb the ladder upward. After that, grab the zipline grip above the underground river and glide slowly to the opposite bank. Hold on tight—one wrong move, and you’ll drown.

Keep a close eye on your surroundings, commit every detail to memory, and don’t miss any anomalies. If you spot no irregularities, exit through the left blue-lighted tunnel at the outlet. Notice something unusual? Slide into the right red-lighted tunnel immediately.

To figure out what’s happening, you’ve set up a clue wall at the entrance. You can pick up the camera from your chest at any time to photograph these anomalies. Capture a key anomaly, and its photo will appear on the wall at the entrance. You can take 3 photos each run.

Choose correctly, and you’ll see the layer number increase. Choose wrong, and you’ll be sent back to Layer 0. Your basic goal: reach sewer #10 and find the final exit. Your ultimate goal: collect 10 or even 20 or more clue photos to uncover the mysterious story behind this cursed place...

Good luck!
